record.title: Build Powerful Sites Your Clients Love
record.description:
Concrete CMS is an open source PHP web content management framework following modern coding standards. It delivers a user experience your clients will love and lets your developers easily create complex web applications that will stand the test of time.

Start a 30-day free trial

record.content:
In-context editing

It always felt natural to us that websites should work like a word processor, not a printing press. Changing content is point and click.

record.paragraph: Editing is so damn easy. I didn’t even watch the training videos.
record.name: John Smith

record.content:
Growing Community

We’ve got a passionate community of developers who are eager to support your efforts as you join the ecosystem of extension builder and services providers who consider Concrete CMS their special secret.

record.paragraph: After having worked in Joomla!, Drupal, WordPress, Orchard, Ektron and Sitefinity, Concrete5 is BY FAR my favorite, go-to CMS system. It's the most intuitive and easiest to work with out of them all.
record.name: John Smith

record.content:
Flexible & Strong

Concrete was designed from the start as a flexible building material for a small team pleasing demanding clients.

record.paragraph: A gem for rapidly developing custom solutions with exceptional usability.
record.name: John Smith

record.titleText: Features You Need, Built Right In

record.content:
Not sure if Concrete CMS is the right choice for your next project?  Join us for a brief developer webinar to fast track the learning process and learn how you could build your solutions out of Concrete.

Free Consultation
